title: 3-Day Maasai Mara Safari
description: Experience the Great Wildebeest Migration and Big 5 sightings in Maasai Mara National Reserve.

title: 5-Day Amboseli & Tsavo Safari
description: Explore Mount Kilimanjaro's backdrop in Amboseli and the red elephants of Tsavo East.

title: 4-Day Lake Nakuru & Naivasha Safari
description: See flamingos, rhinos, and enjoy a boat ride on Lake Naivasha.
